my.uum

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • my.uum.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for connecting the database in SQLite to get the information that had been stored.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Database()
      This is constructor to connect the app with SQLite.

    • Method Detail

      • loginUser

        public static java.lang.String loginUser(java.lang.String ic)
        This method is use for checking the user who had registered or not.
        Parameters:
        ic - User's identity card number.
        Returns:
        If registered user then return the user's staff id otherwise it will return fail in String type.

      • addUser

        public static java.lang.String addUser(java.lang.String icNo,
                                       java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String name,
                                       java.lang.String phone,
                                       java.lang.String email)
        This method is for add new user into the User database.
        Parameters:
        icNo - The user's identity card number.
        id - The user's staff id. It will change to integer type.
        name - The user's name.
        phone - The user's phone number.
        email - The user's email address.
        Returns:
        Status of adding user into User database in String type.

      • getRoom

        public static java.lang.String getRoom()
        This method is for getting the room details from Room database.
        Returns:
        The room's id, description and the maximum capacity in String type.

      • checkRoom

        public static java.lang.String checkRoom(java.lang.String date,
                                         java.lang.String roomID)
        This method is for checking the available time for a specific room based on the date.
        Parameters:
        date - The date of booking that select by user.
        roomID - The room for booking that select by user.
        Returns:
        The available time for booking in String type.

      • addBooking

        public static java.lang.String addBooking(java.lang.String purpose,
                                          java.lang.String date,
                                          java.lang.String time,
                                          java.lang.String roomID,
                                          java.lang.String id)
        This method is for add a new booking into Booking database.
        Parameters:
        purpose - The purpose for booking this room.
        date - The date that select by user.
        time - The slot time that select by user.
        roomID - The room that select by user.
        id - User's staff id. It will change to integer type.
        Returns:
        Status of adding booking into Booking database in String type.

      • getBooking

        public static java.lang.String getBooking(java.lang.String id)
        This method is for getting the booking list booked by a specific user.
        Parameters:
        id - User's staff id. It will change to integer type.
        Returns:
        The list of booking detail with room information in String type.

      • checkCancel

        public static java.lang.String checkCancel(java.lang.String roomID,
                                           java.lang.String id)
        This method is for checking the available time to cancel for a specific room and specific user.
        Parameters:
        roomID - The room id to cancel.
        id - User's staff id. It will change to integer type.
        Returns:
        The list of available time to cancel in String type.

      • cancelRoom

        public static java.lang.String cancelRoom(java.lang.String date,
                                          java.lang.String time,
                                          java.lang.String roomID,
                                          java.lang.String id)
        This method is for delete the booking in the Booking database.
        Parameters:
        date - The date that user select to cancel.
        time - The time that user select to cancel.
        roomID - The room id that user select to cancel.
        id - User's staff id. It will change to integer type.
        Returns:
        Status of cancel the booking in String type.
